titleStmt.title: The kind beleeving hostesse. I owe my hostesse money, shee takes me for her debter, on the buttery doore stands my score, the further on the better. To the tune of, VVhen Willy once had strayed.

notesStmt.note: Possibly by the author of STC 18008. Cf. STC.
In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
